spec_data.Name: gnome-shell-extension-openweather
spec_data.Description:
gnome-shell-extension-openweather is an extension to display weather information
from http://openweathermap.org/ or http://darksky.net for (almost) all locations
of the world in GNOME Shell.
Be aware, that system-wide installed gnome-shell-extensions are disabled by
default and have to be enable by the user(s), if they get installed the first
time.
You can use gnome-tweak-tool (additional package) or run:
"gnome-shell-extension-tool -e openweather-extension@jenslody.de" (without the
quotes) on a console.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:04:19 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Display weather information from many locations in the world
